text: Stjepan Boltižar (1 August 1913 - 30 November 1989) was a Croatian gymnast. He competed in eight events at the 1948 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1913 births Category:1989 deaths Category:Croatian male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Yugoslavia Category:Gymnasts at the 1948 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Varaždin
title: Stjepan Boltižar
